using System.Threading.Tasks;

namespace TestApp;
/// <summary>
/// Runtime class that implements capability interfaces and provides access to effect dependencies.
/// </summary>
public partial class Runtime(global::TestApp.IEmailService emailService, global::TestApp.ISlackService slackService, global::Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory? loggerFactory = null) : IRuntimeCapabilities, global::Deepstaging.Effects.IHasLoggerFactory
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Gets the <c>IEmailService</c> dependency for this runtime.
    /// </summary>
    public global::TestApp.IEmailService EmailService => emailService;
    /// <summary>
    /// Gets the <c>ISlackService</c> dependency for this runtime.
    /// </summary>
    public global::TestApp.ISlackService SlackService => slackService;
    /// <summary>
    /// Gets the logger factory for structured logging of instrumented effect methods.
    /// </summary>
    public global::Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory LoggerFactory => loggerFactory!;
}
